panels.title: Daily Spend by Service Category

azureResourceGraph.query:
resources | where subscriptionId in ("$Subscription")
| where type == "microsoft.compute/disks" or  type == "microsoft.compute/snapshots"
| extend diskState = tostring(properties.diskState)
| extend diskSizeGB = toint(properties.diskSizeGB)
| extend diskCategory = iff(isempty(tostring(properties.osType)), 'Data Disk', 'OS Disk') | extend diskState = iff( type == "microsoft.compute/snapshots", "Snapshot", diskState) 
| summarize total_diskSizeGB = sum(diskSizeGB) by diskState

resources | where subscriptionId in ('$Subscription')
| where type == "microsoft.compute/disks" 
| extend platform = tolower(strcat(tags.Platform, tags.platform))
| extend stage = tolower(strcat(tags.Stage, tags.stage))
| extend platform = iff(isempty(platform), 'unknown', platform)
| extend stage = iff(isempty(stage), 'unknown', stage)
| extend diskState = tostring(properties.diskState)
| extend diskSizeGB = toint(properties.diskSizeGB)
| extend diskCategory = iff(isempty(tostring(properties.osType)), 'Data Disk', 'OS Disk')
| where diskState == 'Unattached'
| order by diskSizeGB desc
| project id, name, diskSizeGB
| limit 100

advisorresources
| where type == 'microsoft.advisor/recommendations'
| where properties.category == 'Cost' 
| where subscriptionId in ('$Subscription')
| summarize
     resources = dcount(tostring(properties.resourceMetadata.resourceId)),
     savings = sum(todouble(properties.extendedProperties.savingsAmount))
     by
     solution = tostring(properties.shortDescription.solution),
     currency = tostring(properties.extendedProperties.savingsCurrency)
| project solution, resources, savings = bin(savings, 0.01), currency
| order by savings desc
